## Material/Surface information file "mat_scene09" ('Small room')

Author: 					Lukas Asp√∂ck / las@akustik.rwth-aachen.de
Date:						2016/07/11	

Notes:						This file contains information about the boundary conditions of the materials (5):
							"mat_scene09_plaster", "mat_scene09_concrete", "mat_scene09_windows", "mat_scene09_floor", "mat_scene09_ceiling"
														
							All relevant values are given in separate files in the csv-format							


## Material information:

Scenes:						09
Origin of data: 			Estimated data for absorption and scattering coefficients (based on database values and in situ measurements)
Angle of incidence:			random incidence
Frequency Range:			20 Hz - 20 kHz (31 third octave values, see line 1 in csv file)	

Absorption coefficients:	[x] (see line 2 in csv file)
Scattering coefficients: 	[x] (see line 3 in csv file) 
Impedance values:			[ ]	

Data files:					/_csv/mat_scene09_plaster.csv
							/_csv/mat_scene09_concrete.csv
							/_csv/mat_scene09_windows.csv
							/_csv/mat_scene09_floor.csv
							/_csv/mat_scene09_ceiling.csv
							
Image files:
							/_img/mat_scene09_ceiling_1.JPG
							/_img/mat_scene09_ceiling_2.JPG
							/_img/mat_scene09_concrete_1.JPG
							/_img/mat_scene09_floor_1.JPG
